1 - Everyone nowadays uses smartphones and tablet. People are on rush and will settle to search using google, yahoo...or whatever search engines.
2 - attackers are now buying keywords or Ads that place these phishing sites on the top of the list. As usual you click with the trust that you are entering a genuine site but actually you land on the FAKE site.
3 - then, the same attack described above takes place.
4 - same method is used for all Banks not specifially RHB

SO..PLEASE TAKE NOTE....DO NOT USE THE SEARCH ENGINE TO GET THE BANKING SITEs...
